Talk_209:
<snd:LaughBad>But he didn't even touch our <clr:0000>journals <clr:ffff>or
the <clr:0000>map <clr:ffff>with the locations of our other
hideouts. What a moron!
Inform the main <clr:0000>hideout <clr:ffff>that the damage
to this branch was minimal. Quickly, now!
Talk_200:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I'll give those miserable Sheikah one
thing—they made us a decent laboratory.
Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Did you stop by our branch because you
were worried about us?

I admit, we've been hurting ever since
Link freed the tailor who was making
our uniforms.
But at least he was so focused on the
tailor that he didn't manage to steal
anything on his way out.
<snd:LaughBad>He didn't even touch our <clr:0000>journal<clr:ffff> or the
<clr:0000>map <clr:ffff>with the locations of our hideouts.
And they call this moron a hero? Ha!
Talk_201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughBad>What did they think was going to happen
after leaving it alone for so long?

We've taken over this place. It's now the
<clr:0000>Yiga Clan's Akkala Branch<clr:ffff>.
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL>Our <clr:0000>journal<clr:ffff> and the <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> marked with our
other hideouts are completely untouched.
What a moron!
And besides, these branches are just
footholds for Master Kohga's domination
of <clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>.
Our enemies can attack them all they
want—his ambitions will not falter!
Talk_202:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>They left some <clr:0000>parts <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>materials<clr:ffff> lying
around here too.

Those might be useful, so send them to
the hideout's research team right away.
Talk_203:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>How "right away" are we talking, here?


I mean, we're in <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>—northeast
Hyrule—and the hideout is all the way
southwest in the <clr:0000>Gerudo region<clr:ffff>.
Since it's on the <clr:0000>completely opposite<clr:ffff> side
of the map, I get the feeling that might
take a while...
Talk_205:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Stow the complaints!


The role of the branches is to provide
intel and supplies to the hideout's
<clr:0000>labs <clr:ffff>and our <clr:0000>bases in the Depths<clr:ffff>!
Anything we think is useful goes to the
<clr:0000>hideout<clr:ffff>! That's the ironclad rule!
Talk_211:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's annoying that Link set the tailor who
made our outfits free...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_100:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Link! Thought you could sneak past us,
did you?!

Come out front, and let's settle this!<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
Talk_207:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>M-my apologies! I'll pass those supplies
along as quickly as I can!
Talk_000_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration>Aha. Judging from your imposing stance,
you must be our newest blademaster.

I've heard all sorts of stories about you.
Have you come to support this branch?

Your help is appreciated. Link set our
tailor free, so things have been hectic.
I admit, we let down our guard there.
<snd:LaughBad>We're just lucky Link is such a moron!
He didn't even notice our <clr:0000>journals <clr:ffff>or the
<clr:0000>map <clr:ffff>marked with our hideouts! Ha!
Talk_208:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I swear, that Link! It's like he just popped
up out of nowhere!

He's just as cowardly as the rumors say!
